thread_id.description: The ID of the thread to which the run and run step belongs.

run_id.description: The ID of the run to which the run step belongs.

step_id.description: The ID of the run step to retrieve.

include[].description:
A list of additional fields to include in the response. Currently the only supported value is `step_details.tool_calls[*].file_search.results[*].content` to fetch the file search result content.

See the [file search tool documentation](/docs/assistants/tools/file-search#customizing-file-search-settings) for more information.
